controls.title: Ensure password creation requirements are configured
controls.description: Password complexity requirements should be enforced
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/security/pwquality.conf and set minlen, dcredit, ucredit, ocredit, lcredit

controls.title: Ensure lockout for failed password attempts is configured
controls.description: Account lockout after failed login attempts prevents brute force attacks

controls.title: Ensure password reuse is limited
controls.description: Users should not be able to reuse recent passwords

controls.title: Ensure password hashing algorithm is SHA-512
